content: **knitted jumper in drops merino extra fine piece knitted top down with round yoke and nordic pattern size s - xxxl** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern me-207 yarn group b ------------------------------------------------------- **size** s - m - l - xl - xxl - xxxl **materials** drops merino extra fine from garnstudio belongs to yarn group b 450-500-550-600-650-700 g colour 03 dark grey 150-200-200-200-250-250 g colour 01 off white **knitting gauge** 21 stitches in width and 28 row vertically in stocking stitch and nordic pattern = 10 x 10 cm needles drops double pointed needles size 4 mm drops circular needle size 4 mm length 40 and 60 or 80 cm for stocking stitch drops double pointed needles size 3 mm drops circular needle size 3 mm length 40 and 80 cm for rib needle size is only a suggestion if you have too many stitches on 10 cm switch to a larger needle size if you have too few stitches on 10 cm switch to a smaller needle size
